title: roasted fillet of beef with lobster ravioli and spring vegetables
description: A showy, high-class dish to impress your friends, combining tender beef fillet and succulent lobster.
ingredients: 1 cooked lobster tail, meat sliced into small, wafer thin slices using a sharp knife
8 baby carrots, cleaned, peeled and trimmed
8 baby turnips, cleaned, peeled and trimmed
1 x 800g/1lb 12¼oz beef fillet, preferably Jersey beef, fully trimmed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 cooked lobster claws, cracked, meat removed and sliced into small, wafer thin slices using a sharp knife
1 packet Shimeji mushrooms (available from some larger supermarkets and Japanese grocers)
300ml/11fl oz beef jus (available from some supermarkets and butchers), to serve
